title: time: format stdNumShortTZ not working
body:
Here is the example:
http://play.golang.org/p/aQzzsC_ZS6

stdNumShortTZ is missed in the case switch: https://github.com/golang/go/blob/f4b4d2f4d9f574fe34b826bf0e6784956a247687/src/time/format.go#L540

Also there is a need to check for stdNumShortTZ before appending minutes here:
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/f4b4d2f4d9f574fe34b826bf0e6784956a247687/src/time/format.go#L556
